name: PocketSmith - minimal calendar height
description: This CSS will remove the calendar title and minimise the calendar height in PocketSmith.
additional_info: Note that this CSS is provided without any support or warranty of any kind, and you may experience visual oddities, especially with the Calendar graph open. This is not an optimal experience, and isn't the way that the PocketSmith calendar should be laid out - but you still may be useful in achieve an all-in-one-page view of the Calendar.
